Name: Puny BOB
About the game: Puny BOB - Explore the bright fantasy world of the Mediterranean kingdom! Meet unusual characters and help them complete their tasks by making difficult decisions. Your journey is unique - these stories tell the story of a simple farmer who changed the world. Clouds began to gather around your farm, your cattle were stolen and the thief left no trace. You have to go on an adventure and figure out what's going on. The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Travel across the map destroying enemy monsters. Meet various game characters ready to help you in exchange for mutual help. Game Features: - Nice pixel graphics - Huge game world - Interesting tasks - Lots of levels
